titleStmt.title: Is not the hand of Joab in all this? Or an enquiry into the grounds of a late pamphlet intituled, the mystery of the new-fashioned-goldsmiths, or bankers, &c. and answering the exceptions in it to the bankers trade.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: The mystery of the new fashioned goldsmiths.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
